message: I have to agree, I've tried to view them all but the backbiting and irrelevance of the questions are just to hard to watch. Perhaps a better solution would be to poll the public and have the most popular questions addressed by the candidates. The media tends to softball the dems and skewer the republicans. I want them all on the hotseat, and while they're at it why not bring up their voting records on the screen behind them so the public knows what they're getting.
